pages.title: Somnium Infuser
pages.text: The Somnium Infuser is a magical device that imbues mixtures with the power of somnium, a valuable energy source. With the infuser, you can create potions that enhance your ability to regenerate somnium, improve your channeling efficiency, and even protect you from fear. It's like a brewing stand, but for potions with a little extra kick!
Who knows what other potions can be infused with Somnium for an incredibly powerful result?
To build a somnium infuser you need Test Tube and Test Tube Head
pages.name: Somnium Infuser

pages.text: If you have both materials you can now build a somnium infuser!
